modName: Atronach stone and perk fix for conjuration
summary: Conjure creatures while having the atronach stone/perk active
descriptionHtml:
I understand the previous description was  not so clear, so here is a new one ;)

To see the effects of the mod, try to activate the atronach stone, 
then summon something repeatedly, you\'ll see that around 30-50% of the time, nothing happens 
(you get the sound but nothing is summoned)
The bug is also reported on a wiki, see the notes and tips section
http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Conjuration_%28Skyrim%29

This is due to the effects of the stone that is absorbing the spell,
just look carefully at your magika, notice how it replenishes.

For normal conjuration spells it\'s not so much of a problem, just cast it repeatedly
until somthing gets out, but for powers/shouts that have a cooldown time, you get
a 50% chance to have it work, rendering them useless.

Simply put :
This mod prevents magic resist/absorb effect to take place on your summoning spells.
Mod also available on the steam workshop
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8220

First release :
- Conjure Dragon Priest
- Conjure Familiar
- Conjure Flame Atronach
- Conjure Frost Atronach
- Conjure Storm Atronach

2nd release :
- Summon Spectral Assassin
- Call of Valor

3rd release :
- Fire Thrall
- Frost Thrall
- Storm Thrall
- Summon Unbound Dremora (not sure if it can be obtained in game though)

4th release :
- Flamming Familiar
author: AtomicGlide
